amendment.description: Amendment sought to express the sense of Congress that railway transportation should be included in transportation security plans for intelligence agencies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 112-75 to establish the sense of Congress that railway transportation should be included in transportation security plans for intelligence agencies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carney amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 189 (Roll no. 326).
